section.summary:
Debate

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

This week will feature a live debate within our class meeting. All class members are required to participate.

Due this week:

  • MYMOP follow up form
  • Affirmative and Negative teams complete responses to debate questions Discussion Forum #3 - Debate (Group Collaboration Space)

Due next week: Case Study
